title: Review: The Coros Dura Bike Computer Has Improved Massively, but It Still Isn’t Perfect
content:
Has the Dura become a computer we can trust? We rode with it for over 300 hours to find out.

Read the full article at Review: The Coros Dura Bike Computer Has Improved Massively, but It Still Isn’t Perfect on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
